refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the appstream-compose command.

appstream-compose is a simple app that takes a prefix (default /usr) and a set of application names. It looks for metainfo, desktop and icon files with that basename in $prefix/share/[metainfo|applications|icons] and generates appstream xml files and icons in (by default) $prefix/share/app-info.
